<!-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê -->
<section id="volunteer" class="reveal-on-scroll" style="background-color: #FFFFFF; padding: 3.5rem 1.5rem;">
  <div style="max-width: 780px; margin: 0 auto;">
    <h2 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: clamp(1.75rem, 3vw, 2.25rem); color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.75rem; font-weight: 600;">
      Volunteer With Us
    </h2>
    <div style="width: 60px; height: 3px; background-color: #1F5E3B; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;"></div>

    <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 1.05rem; line-height: 1.8; color: #5A5955; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
      Our volunteers are the hands and feet of this ministry. Whether you have an hour a week or a season to give, there is a place for you.
    </p>

    <!-- Volunteer areas grid -->
    <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 1rem; margin: 2rem 0;">
      <div style="background: #F7F6F2; border-radius: 10px; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem;">
        <strong style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #1F5E3B;">‚ú¶ Youth Mentorship</strong>
        <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #5A5955; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0.5rem 0 0;">Walk alongside young people in faith, academics, and life decisions.</p>
      </div>
      <div style="background: #F7F6F2; border-radius: 10px; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem;">
        <strong style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #1F5E3B;">‚ú¶ Teaching & Education</strong>
        <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #5A5955; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0.5rem 0 0;">Lead workshops, tutor students, or facilitate Bible study discussions.</p>
      </div>
      <div style="background: #F7F6F2; border-radius: 10px; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem;">
        <strong style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #1F5E3B;">‚ú¶ Events & Hospitality</strong>
        <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #5A5955; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0.5rem 0 0;">Help plan and host community gatherings, cultural events, and retreats.</p>
      </div>
      <div style="background: #F7F6F2; border-radius: 10px; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem;">
        <strong style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #1F5E3B;">‚ú¶ Professional Skills</strong>
        <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #5A5955; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0.5rem 0 0;">Share career expertise, offer resume coaching, or lead financial literacy sessions.</p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Volunteer Form -->
    <div style="background: #F7F6F2; border-radius: 12px; padding: 2rem; margin-top: 2.5rem;">
      <h3 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: 1.35rem; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600;">Express Your Interest</h3>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #5A5955; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">Tell us about yourself and how you'd like to serve. We'll be in touch soon.</p>

      <form name="volunteer" method="POST" data-netlify="true" style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem;">
        <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="volunteer" />

        <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 1rem;">
          <div>
            <label for="vol-name" style="display: block; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.4rem;">Full Name *</label>
            <input type="text" id="vol-name" name="name" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.7rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; background: #FFFFFF; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
          </div>
          <div>
            <label for="vol-email" style="display: block; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.4rem;">Email *</label>
            <input type="email" id="vol-email" name="email" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.7rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; background: #FFFFFF; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 1rem;">
          <div>
            <label for="vol-phone" style="display: block; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.4rem;">Phone</label>
            <input type="tel" id="vol-phone" name="phone" style="width: 100%; padding: 0.7rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; background: #FFFFFF; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
          </div>
          <div>
            <label for="vol-interest" style="display: block; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.4rem;">Area of Interest *</label>
            <select id="vol-interest" name="interest" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.7rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; background: #FFFFFF; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
              <option value="">Select an area</option>
              <option value="youth-mentorship">Youth Mentorship</option>
              <option value="teaching">Teaching & Education</option>
              <option value="events">Events & Hospitality</option>
              <option value="administration">Administration & Operations</option>
              <option value="professional-skills">Professional Skills Training</option>
              <option value="spiritual-formation">Spiritual Formation</option>
              <option value="other">Other</option>
            </select>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div>
          <label for="vol-message" style="display: block; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.4rem;">Tell Us About Yourself</label>
          <textarea id="vol-message" name="message" rows="4" placeholder="What draws you to this work? How would you like to contribute?" style="width: 100%; padding: 0.7rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; background: #FFFFFF; resize: vertical; transition: border-color 200ms ease;"></textarea>
        </div>

        <button type="submit" style="align-self: flex-start; background-color: #1F5E3B; color: #FFFFFF; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.75rem 2rem; border-radius: 8px; border: none; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 200ms ease; min-height: 48px;">
          Submit Volunteer Interest
        </button>
      </form>
    </div>
  </div>

  <style>
    #volunteer input:focus,
    #volunteer select:focus,
    #volunteer textarea:focus {
      outline: none;
      border-color: #1F5E3B !important;
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(31,94,59,0.12);
    }
    #volunteer button:hover {
      background-color: #2A7A4E !important;
    }
    @media (max-width: 640px) {
      #volunteer div[style*="grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr"] {

      }
      div[style*="grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr)"][style*="margin: 2rem 0"] {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
</section>

<!-- PARTNERSHIP SECTION                             -->
<!-- ‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê -->
<section id="partner" class="reveal-on-scroll" style="background-color: #F7F6F2; padding: 3.5rem 1.5rem;">
  <div style="max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto;">
    <h2 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: clamp(1.75rem, 3vw, 2.25rem); color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.75rem; font-weight: 600;">
      Partner With Us
    </h2>
    <div style="width: 60px; height: 3px; background-color: #C9A227; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;"></div>

    <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 1.05rem; line-height: 1.8; color: #5A5955; max-width: 700px; margin-bottom: 2.5rem;">
      Meaningful change happens through collaboration. We partner with organizations that share our commitment to equipping youth, strengthening families, and building resilient communities.
    </p>

    <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 1.5rem;">

      <!-- Churches -->
      <div style="background: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 12px; padding: 2rem 1.5rem; border-left: 4px solid #1F5E3B;">
        <div style="font-size: 1.75rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">‚õ™</div>
        <h3 style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.1rem; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">Churches</h3>
        <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.95rem; color: #5A5955; line-height: 1.7;">
